item.title:
I‚Äôm actually a very soft quant interviewer
> 95% of the qs will be based on what you wrote in CV > don‚Äôt ask brainteasers > don‚Äôt ask leetcode > don‚Äôt ask city you were born in > don‚Äôt ask first pet you had > don‚Äôt ask mother‚Äôs maiden name > don‚Äôt ask your name
you‚Äôre welcome
item.dc:creator: @quantymacro
item.description:
I‚Äôm actually a very soft quant interviewer

> 95% of the qs will be based on what you wrote in CV
> don‚Äôt ask brainteasers
> don‚Äôt ask leetcode
> don‚Äôt ask city you were born in
> don‚Äôt ask first pet you had
> don‚Äôt ask mother‚Äôs maiden name
> don‚Äôt ask your name
